Welcome to Risk Tutorial mode! This game mode intends to teach you the basics of the game and
provide an understanding of how to play a match of risk. We start with the claim phase, each
player takes turns placing one troop on one unclaimed country. Watch how the bot does it
and try it out by clicking on the highlighted country.
Now the game can begin! There are three phases each round: Reinforce, Attack, Fortify. Let's
check them out. At the beginning of each reinforce phase, you get a certain amount of troops
and can place them on any of the countries that belong to you
Now we get to the attack phase: Select a country you own, then select one of the adjacent
enemy territories and choose with how many troops you want to attack. You then roll dice to
decide a winner. If the attacker wins, they must choose an amount of troops to move to the
defeated country
Finally, the fortify phase: The player has the ability to pick exactly one country and
move some of its troops to an adjacent country
Now your turn! For simplicity, your moves have been highlighted in order to give you a feel
of how to play a turn. This is the tutorial after all!
If you conquer a country during the attack phase, you will receive a random card from the
deck at the end of your turn. According to the rulebook, at the beginning of a turn you have
the ability to swap 3 cards which match specific rules and get extra troops in return for
your reinforce phase. Right now, you have the chance to try out swapping cards. Make sure
to read the rulebook for an explanation of the card-swapping rules.
That's all for the tutorial, now you can choose to continue the game from this state against a
bot of your choosing or leave the tutorial. Remember to read the rulebook if you need
clarification on anything!
